pr_title: Added error msg when isbn entry was not found

timeline.message: add error msg when isbn entry not found

timeline.author: Siedlerchr

timeline.bodyText:
This is not the right place. You cannot put GUI code into logic/model classes.
See https://devdocs.jabref.org/getting-into-the-code/high-level-documentation
The right place to check if the results are empty would be here: Than you have it generic as well for all kind of fetchers

  
    
      jabref/src/main/java/org/jabref/gui/EntryTypeViewModel.java
    
    
         Line 147
      in
      7f4c36c
    
    
    
    

        
          
           Optional<BibEntry> result = fetcherWorker.getValue();
timeline.author: Siedlerchr

replies.bodyText: oops, my mistake. I'll fix it later today. I have another question about the ottobib fetcher though, should getting no results throw an exception? Ottobib seems like a special case since supplying an ISBN that leads to no entry doesn't give a 404 but instead leads to a special page with an error message.
replies.author: tmrd993
Siedlerchr

replies.bodyText:
Thanks for your work so far.
Exceptions are only for exceptional program states. An unkown ISBN is a possible case in Ottobib. Thats probably why Ottobib does not show 404, but a page saying: unkown ISBN.
See: https://github.com/HugoMatilla/Effective-JAVA-Summary#57-use-exceptions-only-for-exceptional-conditions
replies.author: calixtus

timeline.message: move error dialog to EntryTypeViewModel, add changelog entry

timeline.bodyText: Can I leave this error message or should it be unique?
timeline.author: tmrd993
